Language workbench to create Domain-Specific Languages

Releases

MPS 2025.1 Release Candidate Is Here!

We’re excited to announce that the Release Candidate for MPS 2025.1 is now available! Download it today and be among the first to try out the latest features and improvements.

DOWNLOAD MPS 2025.1 RC

Curious about what’s new? Check out this blog post for a deep dive into all the updates.

The full list of fixed issues can be found here.
